title: when to recall in lane?
body: I always get paranoid on recalling, ESPECIALLY mid, if I don't have teleport off cooldown and the minion wave is halfway through, the enemy can push and get a tower while I'm gone! I like having the jungler keep lane for me while I'm gone, but I'm afraid this might be rude even though I think the gold per second is higher in lane than in camps. So instead, I treat recalling like extremely long roaming, I shove the wave right before the tower tries to kill the minions and race back to lane while the enemy is roaming and ganking.

If you kill the enemy minion wave as soon as it arrives, you will have 30-40 seconds to recall and get back to lane before the next wave hits your tower. This is plenty of time (especially mid since it takes less time to walk back) and you shouldn't lose more than a couple of minions and certainly not the tower. Just decide in advance so you dont waste time before recalling

Well if the enemy laner has recalled push out the lane and then recall or if the enemy laner is still in lane but your low and you have to recall, I usually wait till the jungler is near the mid lane area (wolves) and call the jungler to cover my lane.
